name: Tomato Hunter
description:
Tomato Hunter

by Pxl Squad

Without tomatoes, there is no catchup. And french fries are pointless without catchup. After years of searching for tomatoes and eating tasteless fries, Tomato Hunter finally found the legendary lab that seems to have tomatoes.

Controls:

Directional - Control the Hunter

Z - Stealth Mode

X - Shoot Fries

Credits:

Rafael Lima

Bruno Araujo

Edson Correa

Sound - redbuttonaudio.co.uk
